capsules_submitted.utterance: Snape's affiliation with Hogwarts is definitely confirmed. I mean, he was the Potions master for many years and held a position of authority within the school. It's hard to imagine him not being affiliated with Hogwarts in some capacity.

Snape's affiliation with Hogwarts is quite complicated, to be honest. I mean, he was a double agent working for the Order of the Phoenix while pretending to be a loyal Death Eater. It's hard to say whether his true loyalties lay with the Dark Lord or with the greater good. (Certainty: 60%, Polarity: Negative, Sentiment: Neutral, Emotion: Cautious)

capsules_submitted.utterance: I've always thought that Snape's affiliation with Hogwarts was a bit of a complicated one.
